#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string s;
    cin>>s;
    int i=0,l=0,o=0,v=0,e=0,y=0,u=0;
    int n=s.length();
    for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
    {
        if(s[j]=='i')
            i++;
        else if(s[j]=='l')
            l++;
        else if(s[j]=='o')
            o++;
        else if(s[j]=='v')
            v++;
        else if(s[j]=='e')
            e++;
        else if(s[j]=='y')
            y++;
        else if(s[j]=='u')
            u++;
    }
    if(i>=1&&l>=1&&o>=2&&v>=1&&e>=1&&y>=1&&u>=1)
        cout<<"happy\n";
    else
        cout<<"sad\n";
}
